results.text: የሁለቱ ምሥራቆች ጌታ፤ የሁለቱ ምዕራቦችም ጌታ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: (እንዳይዋሐዱ) በመካከላቸው ጋራጅ አልለ፡፡ (አንዱ ባንዱ ላይ) ወሰን አያልፉም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
